skills.skill: PLC, HMI, or SCADA design, configuration, and programming

duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing assignments of limited scope which require the application of standard techniques, procedures, and criteria in carrying out a sequence of related engineering tasks.
Supporting multi-disciplinary teams on control system testing, equipment commissioning, and field testing.
PLC, DCS, HMI and SCADA system planning, design, programming, and upgrade.
Developing drawings and specifications for construction.
Equipment selection, cost estimating, equipment layout and coordination with other engineering disciplines.
Ability and willingness to travel to an off-site location and/or accept client site assignments when required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering
